Poor implementation of 2FA, the app requires far more permissions than is necessary. Location, files and phone should not be required in this type of app. The manual auth is hidden behind the settings wheel and fingerprint... Why? Touching any of your organisation's asks if you want to remove it. Just not a great UI experience being difficult to navigate. I will caveat that the overall PingSSO experience is not entirely the apps fault and that some issues are a result of the underlying system.
